::Aerotaur::
    "Interesting.  Lead the way to your holes."  He opens a com to BH and 
Lambda.  "Burning Hammer, Lambda.  We have an incoming attack.  You are to 
defend the front of the base while we surprise them."  He closes the com and 
looks to Grounded.

::Lambda::
    She snaps out of her restless sleep.  She stands and looks around the CR 
room.  Burning Hammer was no longer in his chamber.  "Burning Hammer?"  She 
receives the com and heads to the front of the base.
